reviewText: This DVD has a lot of great information in it that you will want if you do dry room boby treatments.  It show you not only how to do the treatment and some background on them but how to set up your room.  Learning the way they set up their room and interact with the client is worth the purchase.  This is a great video of beginner so a seasonned vet just looking to add some new treatments.

I have good knowledge of basic body scrubs and exfoliating techniques, but this DVD provides additional knowledge for the more complicated procedures that I've wanted to see more instruction on. The demonstrations are incredibly detailed and useful, and the instructor is very skilled and clearly knowledgeable. I enjoyed being able to see how she consulted with clients and kept them comfortable from start to finish. Her methods truly have ensured the best results. If you're interested in seeing body microdermabrasion and other more advanced exfoliation techniques, this is a great DVD.
